About Me

Software Engineer

Blogger

Dreamer, doer, go-getter

I enable businesses. I transform ideas into products using my coding superpowers. I am capable of building highly scalable solutions powered by the cloud! I am pro-serverless and pro-automation. If there's something that can be automated, I'll do it! I have worked at several startups from early stage phases and lead them to new heights. I am not your average "developer", I am extremely passionate about my work and love what I do. I also try be a part of the local developer community. I conduct training sessions, attend meetups and conferences and have spoken at a few myself.

Work

I ♥ Software Engineering

I am currently working at FINN GmbH, a car-subscription startup based out of Munich, Germany. I work there as a Senior Software Engineer II. I love working with TypeScript and AWS and my expertise lies in designing backend systems. I come from India. My professional life started out in 2015 and I have worked in various Indian startups before joining FINN in May 2020. Starting at FINN, my main task was to analyze the existing processes in subscription management and car delivery, and to automate them. Automated processes are one of the main USPs of FINN. As FINN grew, I moved on to a specific sub-team in Operations department: the Customer Product team, to focus on building better services for our customers and acheived a industry leading Net Promoter Score (NPS) of 75! My Team and I also built a multi-country (EU and US) backend system to help us scale from 10,000 to 100,000 car subscriptions.

For a complete and detailed work history, please refer to my LinkedIn page.

Got a great idea? Let's talk!

Message me on LinkedIn and I'll get back to you as soon as time allows me. I'm always open to collaborations and opportunities. We could even talk about tech or you can show me your cool weekend project.
